If a human stood on Mars and witnessed a Martian sunset, the chances are it would appear pale blue.
The reason for this is also why Mars is called the Red Planet, along with the fact it has an atmos… [+82 chars]

articles.title: Newly Discovered Comet On Its Way To Earth Should Be Visible To The Naked Eye Soon - IFLScience
articles.description: It could get as bright as Venus come late summer/early autumn.
articles.content: Eyes on the sky, people: Comet C/2023 A3 (TsuchinshanATLAS) has a good chance of getting bright enough to be visible to the naked eye in the coming months. It is currently visible only to telescopes,… [+1290 chars]
